reviewText:
Legend Video makes a lot of Cable Versions of their X-Rated features and this is one of them. You have to understand, this is full pornography that was simply shot from a different angle as to hide the X-Rated shots so they could make a Cable Version of the film. This isn't Softcore as Softcore pertains to fake sex, this was a real X movie. Most people don't understand this and incidentally rate it badly for their ignorance of the differences.

I'm satisfied as I knew exactly what I was getting. Also in most of these Cable Versions, sometimes the Camera doesn't get out of the way fast enough and you get brief glimpses of the action. While the Male nudity is hidden, you do see full female nudity in these.

This film is presented in 4:3 format and regardless of what the back says, there are NO Special Features. I gave it 4 stars because this one wasn't as great as some of the other ones offered here.
